verses.padam: - Padam prajavamiti# pra - java̱m|vai|EtEna|yanti|yat|daśamam|aha̍ḥ|pApAvahIyamiti̍# pApa - avahIya̱m|vai|EtEna|Bavanti|yat|daśamam|aha̍ḥ|yaḥ|vai|prajavamiti̍# pra - java̱m|yatAm|apathEna|pratipadya̍ta̍ iti# prati - padyatE|yaḥ|sthAṇum|hanti̍|yaḥ|BrEṣa̱m|nyEtIti̍# ni - Eti|saḥ|hIyatE|saḥ|yaḥ|vai|daśamE|ahann̍|avivAkya̍ ityavi̍ - vAkyE|upahanyata ityupa-hanyatE̱|saḥ|hIyatE|tasmai̱|yaḥ|upa̍hatAyEtyupa̍-hatAya|vyAhEti̍# vi - Aha|tam|Eva|anvAraByEtya̍nu̍ - AraBya|samiti̍|aśnutE|atha̍|yaḥ|vyAhEti̍# vi - Aha|saḥ|1̍ ( 50)
verses.samhita: prajavaM ~MvA EtEna# yanti yad-daśamamaha̍ḥ̍ pApAvahIyaM ~MvA EtEna# Bavanti yad-daśamamaharyO̍ vai prajavaM̍ ~MyatAmapathEna̍ pratipadyatE̍ yaḥ sthAṇuṃ hanti yO BrEṣaM nyEti sa hIyatE̍ sa yO vai daśamE&ha̍nnavivAkya̍ upahanyatE̍ sa hIyatE̍ tasmai ya upahatAya̍ vyAha tamEvAnvAraBya samaśnutE&tha̍ yO vyAha sa - [ ] 1

verses.padam: - Padam hIyatE|tasmA̱t|daśamE|ahann|avivAkya̍ ityavi̍ - vAkyE|upahatAyEtyupa̍# - hatAya|na|vyucyamiti# vi-ucya̱m|athO iti|Kalu̍|Ahuḥ|yajñasya̍|vai|samRu̍ddhEnEti̍ saM - RuddhEna|dEvAḥ|suvargamiti# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|Ayann|yajñasya|vyRu̍ddhEnEti̍ vi - RuddhEna|asurAn|parEti̍|aBAvayann|iti̍|yat|Kalu̍|vai|yajñasya̍|samRu̍ddhamiti̍ saM - Ruddham|tat|yajamAnasya|yat|vyRu̍ddhamiti̍ vi-Ruddham|tat|BrAtRuvyasya|saḥ|yaḥ|vai|daśamE|ahann̍|avivAkya̍ ityavi̍ - vAkyE|upahanyata ityupa̍ - hanyatE̱|saḥ|Eva|atIti|rEcayati|tE|yE|bAhyA̱ḥ|dRuśIkava̍ḥ|2̍ (50)
verses.samhita: hIyatE̍ tasmA̱d-daśamE &hannavivAkya̍ upahatAya̍ na vyucyamathO KalvAhuryajñasya̍ vai samRuddhEna̍ dEvAḥ suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamAyan̍ yajñasya vyRuddhEnAsu̍rAn̍ parA&BAvayanniti̍ yat Kalu vai yajñasya samRuddhaM̍ tad-yajamAnasya̍ yadvyRuddhaM̍ tadBrAtRuvyasya̍ sa yO vai daśamE&ha̍nnavivAkya̍ upahanyatE̍ sa EvAti# rEcayati tE yE bAhyA# dRuśIkavaḥ - [ ] 2

verses.padam: - Padam syuḥ|tE|vIti|brUyuḥ|yadi̍|tatra̍|na|vindEyu̍ḥ|antassadasAditya̍ntaḥ̍ - sadasAt|vyucyamiti# vi - ucya̱m|yadi|tatra̍|na|vindEyu̍ḥ|gRuhapa̍tinEti̍# gRuha - patinA|vyucyamiti# vi- ucya̱m|tat|vyucyamiti# vi - ucya̱m|Eva|atha|vai|Etat|sarparAjñiyA̍ iti# sarpa - rAjñiyA̱ḥ|RugBirityRuk̍ - Biḥ|stuvanti|iyam|vai|sarpataḥ|rAjñI̱|yat|vai|asyAm|kim|ca|arca̍nti|yat|AnRucuḥ|tEna̍|iyam|sarparAjñIti̍# sarpa-rAjñI|tE|yat|Eva|kim|ca|vAcA|AnRucuḥ|yat|atOdhi|arcitAra̍ḥ|3̍ (50)
verses.samhita: syustE vi brUyuryadi̍ tatra na vindEyurantassadasAd-vyucyaM̍ ~Myadi tatra na vindEyurgRuhapa̍tinA̍ vyucyaM tadvyucyamEvAtha̍ vA Etath sarparAjñiyA̍# RugBiḥ stuvantayaM̍ ~Mvai sarpatO̍ rAjñI yadvA asyAM kiM cArcanti̍ yadAnRucustEnEyaṃ̍ sarparAjñI̍ tE yadEva kiM ca# vAcA &&nRucuryadatO&ddhyarcitAra̍ - [ ] 3

verses.padam: - Padam tat|uBaya̱m|AptvA|avaruddhyEtyava̍ - ruddhya|uditi̍|tiṣṭhAma|iti̍|tABi̍ḥ|mana̍sA|stuvatE|na|vai|imAm|aśvaratha̍ ityaśva̍ - rathaḥ|na|aśvatarIratha ityaśvatarI̍ - rathaḥ|sadyaḥ|paryA̱ptumiti pari-Aptum|aṛqhati|mana̍ḥ|vai|imAm|sadyaḥ|paryA̱ptumiti̍ pari# - Aptum|aṛqhati|manaḥ|pari̍Bavitumiti̍ pari-Bavitum|atha̍|brahma̍|vadanti|pari̍mitA̍ iti pari-mitAḥ|vai|Ruca̍ḥ|pari̍mitAnIti̍ pari# - mitAni|sAmAni|pari̍mitAnIti̍ pari# - mitAni|yajUṃṣi|atha̍|Etasya̍|Eva|anta̍ḥ|na|asti|yat|brahma̍|tat|pratigRuṇata̍ iti# prati - gRuṇatE|Eti|cakṣIta|saḥ̍ ( )|pratigara iti# prati - garaḥ||4 (51)
verses.samhita: -staduBayamAptvA̍ &varuddhyOt tiṣṭhAmEti̍ tABirmanasA̍ stuvatE na vA imAmaśvarathO̍ nA&śvatarIrathaḥ̍ sadyaḥ paryA̱ptumaṛhati manO vA imAṃ sadyaḥ paryA̱ptumaṛhati manaḥ pariBavitumatha̍ brahma# vadanti parimitA̍ vA Rucaḥ parimitAni̍ sAmAni̍ parimitAni̍ yajUṅqṣyathaitasyaivAntO nAsti yad-brahma tat pratigRuṇata̍ A cakṣIta̍ sa ( ) pratigaraḥ||4̍

verses.padam: - Padam brahmavAdina iti# brahma - vAdinaḥ|vadanti|kim|dvAdaśAhasyEti̍# dvAdaśa - ahasya|prathamEna̍|ahnA̱|RutvijA̱m|yaja̍mAnaḥ|vRu~gktE|iti̍|tEja̍ḥ|indriyam|iti̍|kim|dvitIyE̍na|iti̍|prAṇAniti̍# pra - anAn|annAdyamityanna̍ - adya̱m|iti|kim|tRutIyE̍na|iti̍|trIn|imAn|lOkAn|iti̍|kim|caturtthEna̍|iti̍|catu̍ṣpada̍ iti catuḥ-padaḥ|paśUn|iti̍|kim|pa~jcamEna̍|iti̍|pa~jcA̱kṣarAmiti̍ pa~jca# - akṣarAm|pa~gktim|iti|kim|ṣaṣṭhEna̍|iti̍|ṣaṭ|RutUn|iti̍|kim|saptamEna̍|iti̍|saptapa̍dAmiti̍# sapta - padAm|śakvarIm|iti̍|5̍ (50)
verses.samhita: brahmavAdinO# vadanti kiM dvAdaśAhasya̍# prathamEnAhnartvijAM ~MyajamAnO̍ vRu~gkta iti tEja# indriyamiti kiM dvitIyEnEti# prAṇAnannAdyamiti kiM tRutIyEnEti trInimAn ~MlOkAniti kiM caturtthEnEti̍ catuṣpadaḥ̍ paśUniti kiM pa~jcamEnEti̍ pa~jcA̱kṣarAM pa~gktimiti kiṃ ṣaṣṭhEnEti ṣaḍ RutUniti kiṃ saptamEnEti̍# saptapadAṃq̍ śakvarImiti̍ - [ ] 5

verses.padam: - Padam kim|aṣṭamEna|iti̍|aṣṭAkṣa̍rAmityaṣṭA̍ - akṣarAm|gAyatrIm|iti|kim|navamEna̍|iti̍|trivRutamiti̍# tri - vRuta̱m|stOma̱m|iti|kim|daśamEna̍|iti̍|daśA̱kṣarAmiti̍ daśa# - akṣarAm|virAjamiti# vi - rAja̱m|iti|kim|EkAdaśEna̍|iti̍|EkA̍daśAkṣarAmityEkA̍daśa̍ - akṣarAm|triṣṭuBa̱m|iti|kim|dvAdaśEna̍|iti̍|dvAda̍śAkṣarAmiti̍ dvAdaśa̍ - akṣarAm|jagatIm|iti̍|EtAva̍t|vai|asti|yAva̍t|Etat|yAva̍t|Eva|asti̍|tat|EṣAm|vRu~gktE||6̍ (41) (śakvarImityE̍ - kacatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A2)
verses.samhita: kimaṣṭamEnEtyaṣṭAkṣa̍rAM̍ gAyatrImiti kiM navamEnEti̍# trivRutaṅq stOmamiti kiM daśamEnEti̍ daśA̱kṣarAM ~MvirAjamiti kimEkAdaśEnEtyEkA̍daśAkṣarAM̍ triṣṭuBamiti kiM dvAdaśEnEti̍ dvAdaśAkṣarAM̍ jagatImityEtAvadvA̍ asti̍ yAvadEtad-yAva̍dEvAsti̍ tadEṣAM̍ ~MvRu~gktE||6 (śakvarImityE̍ - kacatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam Eṣaḥ|vai|Aptaḥ|dvAdaśAha iti# dvAdaśa - ahaḥ|yat|trayOdaśarAtra iti# trayOdaśa - rAtraḥ|samAnam|hi|Etat|ahaḥ|yat|prAyaṇIya̍ iti# pra - ayanIyaḥ|ca|udayanIya̍ ityut̍ - ayanIyaḥ|ca|trya̍tirAtra̍ iti tri - atirAtraḥ|Bavati|trayaḥ|imE|lOkAḥ|EṣAm|lOkAnA̱m|Aptyai̱|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|vai|prathamaḥ|atirAtra ityati̍ - rAtraḥ|vyAna iti# vi - anaḥ|dvitIyaḥ|apAna̍ ityapa-anaḥ|tRutIya̍ḥ|prAṇApAnOdAnEṣviti̍# prAṇApAna - udAnEṣu|Eva|annAdya̍ ityanna̍ - adyE̱|pratIti|tiṣṭhanti|sarva̱m|Ayu̍ḥ|yanti|yE|Evam|vidvAṃsa̍ḥ|trayOdaśarAtramiti̍# trayOdaśa - rAtram|AsatE|tat|Ahuḥ|vAk|vai|EṣA|vitatEti̍ vi - tatA|7 (50)
verses.samhita: Eṣa vA AptO dvAdaśAhO̍ yat trayOdaśarAtraḥ̍ samAnaṅ̍ hyEtadaharyat̍ prAyaṇIya̍ścOdayanIya̍śca̍ tryatirAtrO̍ Bavati traya# imE lOkA EṣAM ~MlOkAnAmAptyai̱ prAṇO vai prathamO̍&tirAtrO̍ vyAnO dvitIyO# &pAnastRutIyaḥ̍ prAṇApAnO-dAnEṣvEvAnnAdyE prati# tiṣṭhanti sarvamAyuryanti̍ ya EvaM ~MvidvAṃsa-strayOdaśarAtra-mAsa̍tE̍ tadAhurvAgvA̍ EṣA vitatA̍ - [ ] 7

verses.padam: - Padam yat|dvAdaśAha iti# dvAdaśa - ahaḥ|tAm|vIti|Cindyuḥ|yat|maddhyE̱|atirAtramitya̍ti-rAtram|kuryuḥ|upadAsukEtyu̍pa-dAsu̍kA|gRuhapa̍tEriti̍# gRuha - patEḥ|vAk|syAt|upariṣṭAt|CandOmAnAmiti̍# Candaḥ - mAnA̱m|mahAvratamiti# mahA - vratam|kurvanti|saMtatAmiti̍ saM-tatAm|Eva|vAca̱m|avEti|rundhatE|anu̍padAsukEtyanu̍pa̍ - dAsukA|gRuhapatEriti̍# gRuha - patEḥ|vAk|Bavati|paśavaḥ|vai|CandOmA̍ iti# Candaḥ - mAḥ|anna̱m|mahAvratamiti# mahA - vratam|yat|upariṣṭAt|CandOmAnAmiti̍# Candaḥ - mAnA̱m|mahAvratamiti# mahA - vratam|kurvanti|paśuṣu̍|ca|Eva|annAdya̍ ityanna̍ - adyE̱|ca|pratIti|tiṣṭhanti||8̍ (43) (vitatA̍ - tricatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A3)
verses.samhita: yad dvAdaśAhastAM̍ ~MvicCindyuryanmaddhyE̍# &tirAtraM kuryurupadAsu̍kA̍ gRuhapatErvAK̍ syA-dupari̍ṣṭAcCandOmAnA̱M̍ mahAvrataM kurvanti̍ saMtatAmEva̍ vAcamava# rundhatE&nupadAsukA̍ gRuhapatErvAg-Ba̍vati̍ paśavO vai CandOmA̍ annaM̍ mahAvrataM ~MyadupariṣṭAcCandOmAnA̱M̍ mahAvrataM kurvanti# paśuṣu# caivAnnAdyE# ca prati# tiṣṭhanti||8 (vitatA̍ - tricatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam AdityAḥ|akAmayanta|uBayO̱ḥ|lOkayO̱ḥ|RuddhnuyAma|iti|tE|Etam|caturdaśarAtramiti̍# caturdaśa - rAtram|apaśyann|tam|Eti|aharann|tEna̍|ayajanta|tata̍ḥ|vai|tE|uBayO̱ḥ|lOkayO̱ḥ|Ad^^rdhnuvann|asminn|ca|amuṣminn̍|ca|yE|Evam|vidvAṃsa̍ḥ|caturdaśarAtramiti̍# caturdaśa - rAtram|AsatE|uBayO̱ḥ|Eva|lOkayO̱ḥ|Ruddhnuvanti|asminn|ca|amuṣminn̍|ca|caturdaśarAtra̍ iti# caturdaśa - rAtraḥ|Bavati|sapta|grAmyAḥ|Oṣadhayaḥ|sapta|AraṇyAḥ|uBayI̍ṣAm|ava̍ruddhyA̍ ityava-ruddhyai|yat|parAcInA̍ni|pRuṣṭhAni̍|9̍ (50)
verses.samhita: AdityA akAmayantO-BayO̱rlOkayOr̍# RuddhnuyAmEti ta EtaM caturdaśarAtra-̍ mapaśyan̍ tamA&haran̍ tEnAyajanta̍ tatO vai ta uBayO̱-rlOkayO-rArddhnuvannasmiṅścA-muṣmiṅ̍śca̍ ya EvaM ~MvidvAṃsa-̍ ścaturdaśarAtramAsata̍ uBayOrEva̍ lOkayOr.̍ RuddhnuvantyasmiṅścA-muṣmiṅśca̍ caturdaśarAtrO Bavati̍ sapta grAmyA Oṣadhayaḥ̍ saptA&&*raṇyA uBayIṣAmava̍ruddhyai̍ yat parAcInA̍ni̍ pRuṣṭhAni - [ ] 9

verses.padam: - Padam Bavanti|amum|Eva|taiḥ|lOkam|aBIti̍|jayanti|yat|pratIcInA̍ni|pRuṣṭhAni̍|Bava̍nti|imam|Eva|taiḥ|lOkam|aBIti̍|jayanti|trayastriṃqśAviti̍# trayaḥ - triṃqśau|maddhyataḥ|stOmau̱|Bavataḥ|sAmrA̱jyamiti sAM - rAjyam|Eva|gacCanti|adhirAjAvityadhi̍ - rAjau|Bavataḥ|adhirAjA ityadhi̍ - rAjAḥ|Eva|samAnAnA̱m|Bavanti|atirAtrAvityati̍ - rAtrau|aBitaḥ|Bavataḥ|pari̍gRuhItyA̍ iti pari# - gRuhItyai||10 (34) (pRuṣṭhAni - catustriṃśacca)̍ (A4)
verses.samhita: BavantyamumEva̍ tairlOkamaBi jayanti̍ yat pratIcInA̍ni̍ pRuṣṭhAni BavantImamEva̍ tairlOkamaBi jayanti̍ trayastriṃqśau maddhyataḥ̍ stOmau# Bavataḥ sAmrA̱jyamEva gacCantyadhirAjau̍ BavatO&dhirAjA̍ Eva samAnAnA̱M̍ BavantyatirAtrAvaBitO# Bavataḥ parigRuhItyai||10̍ (pRuṣṭhAni - catustriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|suvargamiti# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|ait|tam|dEvAḥ|anviti|Ayann|tAn|AdityAḥ|ca|paśava̍ḥ|ca|anviti̍|Ayann|tE|dEvAḥ|abruvan.|yAn|paśUn|upAjI̍viṣmEtyu̍pa̍ - ajIviṣma|tE|imE|anvAgmannitya̍nu-Agmann̍|iti̍|tEBya̍ḥ|Etam|caturdaśarAtramiti̍# caturdaśa-rAtram|pratIti|auhann|tE|AdityAḥ|pRuṣṭhaiḥ|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|Eti|arOhann|tryahAByAmiti̍# tri - ahAByA̱m|asminn|lOkE|paśUn|pratIti|auhann|pRuṣṭhaiḥ|AdityAḥ|amuṣminn̍|lOkE|Ad^^rdhnu̍vann|tryahAByAmiti̍# tri - ahAByA̱m|asminn|11 (50)
verses.samhita: prajApatiḥ̍ suvargaM ~MlOkamait taM dEvA anvAyan̍ tAnAdityAśca̍# paśavaścAnvAyan̍ tE dEvA abruvana.̍ yAn paśUnupAjIviṣma̍ ta imE̱ &nvAgmanniti tEBya# EtaM caturdaśarAtraM̍ pratyauhan̍ ta AdityAḥ̍ pRuṣṭhaiḥ suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamA&rOhan̍ tryahAByAmasmin̍ ~MlOkE paśUn pratyauhan̍ pRuṣṭhairAdityA̍ amuṣmin̍ ~MlOka Arddhnuvan̍ tryahAByAmasmin̍ - [ ] 11

verses.padam: - Padam lOkE|paśavaḥ|yE|Evam|vidvAṃsa̍ḥ|caturdaśarAtramiti̍# caturdaśa - rAtram|AsatE|uBayO̱ḥ|Eva|lOkayO̱ḥ|Ruddhnuvanti|asminn|ca|amuṣminn̍|ca|pRuṣṭhaiḥ|Eva|amuṣminn̍|lOkE|Ruddhnuvanti̍|tryahAByAmiti̍# tri - ahAByA̱m|asminn|lOkE|jyOtiḥ|gauḥ|Ayu̍ḥ|iti̍|tryaha̍ iti# tri-ahaḥ|Bavati|iyam|vAva|jyOtiḥ|antari̍kṣam|gauḥ|asau|Ayu̍ḥ|imAn|Eva|lOkAn|aByArO̍hantItya̍Bi̍ - ArOhanti|yat|anyata̍ḥ|pRuṣṭhAni̍|syuḥ|vivi̍vadhamiti̍ vi-vivadham|syAt|maddhyE̱|pRuṣṭhAni|Bavanti|savivadhatvAyEti̍# savivadha - tvAya|12̍ (50)
verses.samhita: ~MlOkE paśavO ya EvaM ~MvidvAṃsa-ścaturdaśarAtramAsa̍ta̍ uBayOrEva̍ lOkayOr# RuddhnuvantyasmiṅścAmuṣmiṅśca̍ pRuṣṭhairEvA&muṣmin̍ ~MlOka Ruddhnuvanti̍# tryahAByAmasmin̍ ~MlOkE jyOtirgaurAyuriti# tryahO BavatIyaM̍ ~MvAva jyOtirantari̍kṣaM̍ gaurasAvAyurimAnEva̍ lOkAnaByArOhanti̍ yadanyataḥ̍ pRuṣṭhAni syurvivivadhaṅ̍ syAnmaddhyE# pRuṣṭhAni# Bavanti savivadhatvAyau - [ ] 12

verses.padam: - Padam Ojaḥ|vai|vIrya̱m|pRuṣṭhAni̍|Oja̍ḥ|Eva|vIrya̱m|maddhyataḥ|dadhatE|bRuhadrathantarAByAmiti̍# bRuhat - rathantarAByA̱m|yanti|iyam|vAva|rathantaramiti# rathaM - taram|asau|bRuhat|AByAm|Eva|yanti|athO iti|anayO̱ḥ|Eva|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhanti|EtE̍ iti|vai|yajñasya̍|a~jjasAya̍nI̍ itya~jjasA̍ - ayanI|srutI̍ iti|tAByA̱m|Eva|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|yanti|parA̱~jcaḥ|vai|EtE|suvargamiti# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|aByArOhantItya̍Bi̍ - ArOhanti|yE|parAcInA̍ni|pRuṣṭhAni̍|upayantItyu̍pa̍ - yanti|pratya~g|tryaha̍ iti# tri - ahaḥ|Bavati|pratyavarUḍhyA̍ iti# prati - avarUḍhyai|athO̍ iti|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati-sthityai̍ ( )|uBayO̱ḥ|lOkayO̱ḥ|RuddhvA|uditi|tiṣṭhanti|catu̍rdaśEti̍ catuḥ̍ - daśa|EtAḥ|tAsA̱m|yAḥ|daśa|daśA̱kṣarEti̍ daśa# - akṣarA|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|anna̱m|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|virAjEti# vi - rAjA̱|Eva|annAdyamityanna̍ - adya̱m|avEti|rundhatE|yAḥ|cata̍sraḥ|cata̍sraḥ|diśa̍ḥ|dikṣu|Eva|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhanti|atirAtrAvitya̍ti̍ - rAtrau|aBitaḥ|Bavataḥ|pari̍gRuhItyA̍ iti pari# - gRuhItyai||13 (81) (Ardhnuvan̍ tryahAByAmasminth̍ - savivadhatvAya̍ - pratiṣṭhatyA̍ - Ekatriṃśacca)̍ (A5)
verses.samhita: -jO vai vIryaM̍ pRuṣṭhAnyOja# Eva vIryaM̍ maddhyatO dadhatE̍ bRuhad-rathantarAByA̱M ~MyantIyaM ~MvAva rathantaramasau̍ bRuhadAByAmEva yantyathO# anayOrEva̍ prati# tiṣṭhantyEtE vai yajñasyA̱~jjasAyanI̍ srutI tAByAmEva̍ suvargaM̍ ~MlOkaM ~Myanti̍ parA̱~jcO vA EtE suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamaByArOhanti̍ yE parAcInA̍ni̍ pRuṣṭhAnyupayanti̍# pratya~g tryahO Bavati̍ pratyavarUḍhyA̍ athO pratiṣṭhityA̍ ( ) uBayO̱rlOkayOr# RuddhvOt tiṣṭhanti̍ caturdaśaitAstAsAM̍ ~MyA daśa daśA̱kṣarA virAḍannaM̍ ~MvirAḍ virAjaivAnnAdyamava# rundhatE yAścatasraścata̍srO̍ diśO# dikṣvEva̍ prati# tiṣṭhantyatirAtrAvaBitO# Bavataḥ parigRuhItyai||13̍ (Ardhnuvan̍ tryahAByAmasminth̍ - savivadhatvAya̍ - pratiṣṭhatyA̍ - Ekatriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam indraḥ|vai|sadRu~g~giti̍# sa - dRu~g|dEvatABiḥ|AsIt|saḥ|na|vyAvRutamiti̍# vi - AvRuta̱m|agacCat|saḥ|prajApatimiti̍# prajA - patim|upEti|adhAvat|tasmai̱|Etam|pa~jcadaśarAtramiti̍# pa~jcadaśa-rAtram|prEti|ayacCat|tam|Eti̍|aharat|tEna̍|ayajata|tata̍ḥ|vai|saḥ|anyABi̍ḥ|dEvatA̍Biḥ|vyAvRutamiti̍# vi - AvRuta̱m|agacCat|yE|Evam|vidvAṃsaḥ|pa~jcadaśarAtramiti̍# pa~jcadaśa - rAtram|AsatE|vyAvRutamiti̍# vi - AvRuta̱m|Eva|pApmanA̱|BrAtRuvyEṇa|gacCanti|jyOti̍ḥ|gauḥ|Ayu̍ḥ|iti̍|tryaha̍ iti# tri - ahaḥ|Bavati|iyam|vAva|jyOtiḥ|antari̍kṣam|14̍ (50)
verses.samhita: indrO vai sadRu~g dEvatABirAsIth̍ sa na vyAvRutamagacCath̍ sa prajApatimupA̍dhAvat̍ tasmA# EtaM pa~jcadaśarAtraM̍ prAyacCat̍ tamA&harat̍ tEnAyajata̍ tatO vai sO̱&nyABi-rdEvatA̍Bi-rvyAvRuta̍magacCadya̍ EvaM ~MvidvAṃsaḥ̍ pa~jcadaśarAtramAsatE̍ vyAvRutamEva̍ pApmanA BrAtRuvyEṇa̍ gacCanti jyOtirgaurAyuriti# tryahO BavatIyaM̍ ~MvAva jyOtirantari̍kṣaM̍ - [ ] 14

verses.padam: - Padam gauḥ|asau|Ayuḥ|Eṣu|Eva|lOkEṣu̍|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhanti|asa̍tram|vai|Etat|yat|aCandOmamitya̍Candaḥ̍ - mam|yat|CandOmA iti# Candaḥ - mAḥ|Bavanti|tEna̍|satram|dEvatA̱ḥ|Eva|pRuṣṭhaiḥ|avEti̍|rundhatE|paśUn|CandOmairiti̍# Candaḥ-maiḥ|Ojaḥ|vai|vIrya̱m|pRuṣṭhAni̍|paśava̍ḥ|CandOmA̍ iti# Candaḥ - mAḥ|Ojasi|Eva|vIryE̱|paśuṣu̍|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhanti|pa~jcadaśarAtra̍ iti# pa~jcadaśa - rAtraḥ|Bavati|pa~jcadaśa iti# pa~jca - daśaḥ|vajraḥ|vajra̱m|Eva|BrAtRu̍vyEByaḥ|prEti̍|haranti|atirAtrAvitya̍ti̍ - rAtrau|aBitaḥ|Bavataḥ|indriyasya̍# ( )|parigRuhItyA̍ iti pari# - gRuhItyai||15 (51)
verses.samhita: gaurasAvAyurEṣvE̍va̍ lOkEṣu prati# tiṣṭhantyasatraM̍ ~MvA Etad-yadaCandOmaM̍ ~MyacCandOmA̍ Bavanti̍ tEna# satraM dEvatA# Eva pRuṣṭhairava# rundhatE paśU~jCandOmairOjO̍ vai vIryaM̍ pRuṣṭhAni# paśavaḥ̍ CandOmA OjasyEva̍ vIryE# paśuṣu prati# tiṣṭhanti pa~jcadaśarAtrO Bavati̍ pa~jcadaśO vajrO vajramEva̍ BrAtRuvyEByaḥ̍ pra harantyatirAtrAvaBitO̍# Bavata indriyasya ( ) parigRuhItyai||15̍

verses.padam: - Padam indraḥ|vai|śithilaḥ|iva|apra̍tiṣṭhita̍ ityaprati̍ - sthitaḥ|AsIt|saḥ|asurEByaḥ|abiBEt|saḥ|prajApa̍timiti̍# prajA - patim|upEti|adhAvat|tasmai̱|Etam|pa~jcadaśarAtramiti̍# pa~jcadaśa - rAtram|vajra̱m|prEti|ayacCat|tEna̍|asu̍rAn|parABAvyEti̍# parA - BAvya|vijityEti̍# vi-jitya|śriya̱m|agacCat|agniṣṭutEtya̍gni̍ - stutA̱|pApmAna̱m|niriti|adahata|pa~jcadaśarAtrEṇEti̍# pa~jcadaśa - rAtrEṇa|Oja̍ḥ|bala̱m|indriyam|vIrya̱m|Atmann|adhatta|yE|Evam|vidvAṃsa̍ḥ|pa~jcadaśarAtramiti̍# pa~jcadaśa - rAtram|AsatE|BrAtRu̍vyAn|Eva|parABAvyEti̍# parA - BAvya|vijityEti̍# vi - jitya|śriya̱m|gacCanti|agniṣṭutEtya̍gni̍ - stutA̱|pApmAna̱m|niriti|16̍ (50)
verses.samhita: indrO vai śithila̍ ivA&pratiṣṭhita̍ AsIth sO&surEByO&biBEth̍ sa prajApatimupA̍&dhAvat̍ tasmA# EtaM pa~jcadaśarAtraM̍ ~MvajraM prAyacCat̍ tEnAsurAn̍ parABAvya# vijitya śriyamagacCadagniṣṭutA̍# pApmAnaM niradahata̍ pa~jcadaśarAtrEṇaujO balamindriyaM̍ ~MvIryamAtmanna̍dhatta̍ ya EvaM ~MvidvAṃsaḥ̍ pa~jcadaśarAtramAsatE̍ BrAtRuvyAnEva̍ parABAvya̍# vijitya śriyaM̍ gacCantyagniṣṭutA# pApmAnaM ni - [ ] 16

verses.padam: - Padam dahantE|pa~jcadaśarAtrEṇEti# pa~jcadaśa - rAtrEṇa|Oja̍ḥ|bala̱m|indriyam|vIrya̱m|Atmann|dadhatE|EtAḥ|Eva|paśavyA̱ḥ|pa~jca̍daśEti̍ pa~jca# - daśa|vai|ad^^rdhamAsasyEtyaqd^^rdha̍ - mAsasya|rAtra̍yaḥ|ad^^rdhamAsaśa̍ ityad^^rdhamAsa̍ - śaḥ|saM~Mvathsara iti# saM-vathsaraḥ|ApyatE|saM~Mvathsaramiti# saM-vathsaram|paśavaḥ|anu̍|prEti̍|jAyantE|tasmA̱t|paśavyA̱ḥ|EtAḥ|Eva|suvargyA̍# iti# suvaḥ - gyA̱ḥ|pa~jcadaśEti̍ pa~jca# - daśa|vai|ad^^rdhamAsasyEtyad^^rdha̍ -mAsasya|rAtra̍yaḥ|ad^^rdhamAsaśa̍ ityad^^rdhamAsa̍ - śaḥ|saM~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|ApyatE|saM~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|suvarga iti# suvaḥ - gaḥ|lOkaḥ|tasmA̱t|suvargyA# iti# suvaḥ - gyA̱ḥ|jyOtiḥ|gauḥ|Ayu̍ḥ|iti̍|tryaha̍ iti# tri - ahaḥ|Bavati|iyam|vAva|jyOtiḥ|antari̍kṣam|17̍ (50)
verses.samhita: rdahantE̍ pa~jcadaśarAtrEṇaujO balamindriyaM̍ ~MvIryamAtman̍ dadhata̍ EtA Eva paśavyA̱ḥ̍ pa~jcadaśa̍ vA arddhamAsasya̍ rAtrayO&rddhamAsaśaḥ̍ saM~Mvathsara̍ A̱pyatE saM~MvathsaraM paśavO&nu pra jAyantE̍ tasmA̱t paśavyA# EtA Eva suvargyA̱ḥ̍ pa~jcadaśa̍ vA arddhamAsasya̍ rAtrayO&rddhamAsaśaḥ̍ saM~Mvathsara̍ A̱pyatE saM~Mvathsaraḥ suvargO̍ lOkastasmA̱th suvargyA̱ jyOtirgaurAyuriti# tryahO BavatIyaM̍ ~MvAva jyOtirantari̍kṣaM̍ - [ ] 17

verses.padam: - Padam gauḥ|asau|Ayuḥ|imAn|Eva|lOkAn|aByArO̍hantItya̍Bi̍ - ArOhanti|yat|anyata̍ḥ|pRuṣṭhAni̍|syuḥ|vivi̍vadhamiti̍ vi - vivadham|syAt|maddhyE̱|pRuṣṭhAni|Bavanti|savivadhatvAyEti̍# savivadha - tvAya|Oja̍ḥ|vai|vIrya̱m|pRuṣṭhAni̍|Oja̍ḥ|Eva|vIrya̱m|maddhyataḥ|dadhatE|bRuhadrathantarAByAmiti̍# bRuhat-rathantarAByA̱m|yanti|iyam|vAva|rathantaramiti# rathaM - taram|asau|bRuhat|AByAm|Eva|yanti|athO iti|anayO̱ḥ|Eva|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhanti|EtE̍ iti|vai|yajñasya̍|a~jjasAya̍nI̍ itya~jjasA-aya̍nI|srutI̍ iti|tAByA̱m|Eva|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|18 (50)
verses.samhita: gaurasAvAyurimAnEva̍ lOkAnaByArOhanti̍ yadanyataḥ̍ pRuṣṭhAni syurvivivadhaṅ̍ syAnmaddhyE# pRuṣṭhAni# Bavanti savivadhatvAyaujO vai vIryaM̍ pRuṣṭhAnyOja# Eva vIryaM̍ maddhyatO dadhatE̍ bRuhad-rathantarAByA̱M ~MyantIyaM ~MvAva rathantaramasau̍ bRuhadAByAmEva yantyathO# anayOrEva̍ prati# tiṣṭhantyEtE vai yajñasyA̱~jjasAyanI̍ srutI tAByAmEva̍ suvargaM̍ ~MlOkaM - [ ] 18

verses.padam: - Padam yanti|parA̱~jcaḥ|vai|EtE|suvargamiti# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|aByArOhantItya̍Bi̍ - ArOhanti|yE|parAcInA̍ni|pRuṣṭhAni̍|upayantItyu̍pa̍ - yanti|pratya~g|tryaha̍ iti# tri - ahaḥ|Bavati|pratyavarUḍhyA̍ iti# prati - avarUḍhyai|athO̍ iti|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|uBayO̱ḥ|lOkayO̱ḥ|RuddhvA|uditi|tiṣṭhanti|pa~jca̍daśEti̍ pa~jca# - daśa|EtAḥ|tAsA̱m|yAḥ|daśa|daśA̱kṣarEti̍ daśa# - akṣarA|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|anna̱m|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|virAjEti# vi - rAjA̱|Eva|annAdyamityanna̍ - adya̱m|avEti|rundhatE|yAḥ|pa~jca̍|pa~jca̍|diśa̍ḥ|dikṣu|Eva|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhanti|atirAtrAvitya̍ti̍ - rAtrau|aBitaḥ|Bavataḥ|indriyasya̍|vIrya̍sya|prajAyA̍ iti# pra - jAyai̱ ( )|paśUnAm|parigRuhItyA̍ iti pari# - gRuhItyai||19 (52)
verses.samhita: ~Myanti̍ parA̱~jcO vA EtE suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamaByArOhanti̍ yE parAcInA̍ni̍ pRuṣṭhAnyupayanti̍# pratya~g tryahO Bavati̍ pratyavarUḍhyA̍ athO pratiṣṭhityA̍ uBayO̱rlOkayOr# RuddhvOt tiṣṭhanti̍ pa~jcadaśaitAstAsAM̍ ~MyA daśa daśA̱kṣarA virAḍannaM̍ ~MvirAḍ virAjaivAnnAdyamava# rundhatE yAḥ pa~jca pa~jca diśO# dikṣvEva̍ prati# tiṣṭhantyatirAtrAvaBitO# Bavata indriyasya# vIryasya̍ prajAyai# ( ) paśUnAM parigRuhItyai||19̍

verses.padam: - Padam prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|akAmayata|annAda ityanna̍ - adaḥ|syAm|iti|saḥ|Etam|saptadaśarAtramiti̍# saptadaśa - rAtram|apaśyat|tam|Eti|aharat|tEna̍|ayajata|tata̍ḥ|vai|saḥ|annAda̍ ityanna̍ - adaḥ|aBavat|yE|Evam|vidvAṃsaḥ|saptadaśarAtramiti̍# saptadaśa-rAtram|AsatE|annAdA̍ ityanna-adAḥ|Eva|Bavanti|pa~jcAha̍ iti# pa~jca - ahaḥ|Bavati|pa~jca|vai|Rutava̍ḥ|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|Rutuṣu|Eva|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsarE|pratIti|tiṣṭhanti|athA̍ iti|pa~jcA̱kṣarEti̍ pa~jca# - akṣarA|pa~gktiḥ|pA~gktaḥ|yajñaḥ|yajñam|Eva|avEti̍|rundhatE|asa̍tram|vai|Etat|20̍ (50)
verses.samhita: prajApati-rakAmayatAnnAdaḥ̍ syAmiti sa Etaṃ saptadaśarAtra-ma̍paśyat̍ tamA&harat̍ tEnAyajata̍ tatO vai sO̱&nnAdO&Bavadya̍ EvaM ~MvidvAṃsaḥ̍ saptadaśa-rAtramAsatE̍ &nnAdA Eva Bavanti̍ pa~jcAhO Bavati̍ pa~jca vA Rutavaḥ̍ saM~Mvathsara RutuṣvEva saM~MvathsarE̍ prati# tiṣṭhantyathO pa~jcA̱kṣarA pa~gktiḥ pA~gktO# yajñO yajñamEvA&va# rundhatE &satraM̍ ~MvA Eta- [ ] 20

verses.padam: - Padam yat|aCandOmamityaCandaḥ-mam|yat|CandOmA̍ iti# Candaḥ - mAḥ|Bavanti|tEna̍|satram|dEvatA̱ḥ|Eva|pRuṣṭhaiḥ|avEti̍|rundhatE|paśUn|CandOmairiti̍# Candaḥ - maiḥ|Ojaḥ|vai|vIrya̱m|pRuṣṭhAni̍|paśava̍ḥ|CandOmA̍ iti# Candaḥ - mAḥ|Ojasi|Eva|vIryE̱|paśuṣu̍|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhanti|saptadaśarAtra̍ iti# saptadaśa - rAtraḥ|Bavati|saptadaśa iti# sapta - daśaḥ|prajApatiriti̍# prajA-patiḥ|prajApatEriti̍# prajA - patEḥ|Aptyai̱|atirAtrAvityati̍ - rAtrau|aBitaḥ|Bavataḥ|annAdyasyEtya̍nna̍ - adyasya|pari̍gRuhItyA̍ iti pari# - gRuhItyai||21 (37) (Etath - saptatriṃśacca)̍ (A8)
verses.samhita: -dyadaCandOmaM̍ ~MyacCandOmA̍ Bavanti̍ tEna# satraM dEvatA# Eva pRuṣṭhairava# rundhatE paśU~jCandOmairOjO̍ vai vIryaM̍ pRuṣṭhAni# paśavaḥ̍ CandOmA OjasyEva̍ vIryE# paśuṣu prati# tiṣṭhanti saptadaśarAtrO Bavati̍ saptadaśaḥ prajApatiḥ̍ prajApatErAptyA̍# atirAtrAvaBitO# BavatO&nnAdyasya̍ parigRuhItyai||21̍ (Etath - saptatriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam sA|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|vikramyEti# vi - kramya|atiṣṭhat|brahma̍ṇA|dEvEṣu̍|annE̍na|asu̍rEṣu|tE|dEvAḥ|akAmayanta|uBaya̱m|samiti̍|vRu~jjImahi|brahma̍|ca|anna̱m|ca|iti̍|tE|EtAḥ|viṃqśatim|rAtrI̱ḥ|apaśyann|tata̍ḥ|vai|tE|uBaya̱m|samiti̍|avRu~jjata|brahma̍|ca|anna̱m|ca|brahmavarcasina̍ iti# brahma - varcasinaḥ|annAdA̍ ityanna̍ - adAḥ|aBavann|yE|Evam|vidvAṃsaḥ|EtAḥ|Asa̍tE|uBaya̱m|Eva|samiti̍|vRu~jjatE|brahma̍|ca|anna̱m|ca|22̍ (50)
verses.samhita: sA virAḍ vikramyAtiṣṭhad-brahma̍ṇA̍ dEvEṣvannEnA-surEṣu̍ tE dEvA akAmayantOBayaṃq̍ saM ~MvRu~jjImahi̍ brahma cAnnaM cEti ta EtA viṃśatiṃ̍ rAtrIrapaśyan̍ tatO vai ta uBayaṃq samavRu~jjata̍ brahma cAnnaM̍ ca brahmavarcasinO̱&nnAdA aBavanq.̍ ya EvaM ~MvidvAṃsa# EtA Asata̍ uBayamEva̍ saM~M vRu~jjatE̍ brahma cAnnaM̍ ca - [ ] 22

verses.padam: - Padam brahmavarcasina iti# brahma - varcasinaḥ|annAdA̍ ityanna̍ - adAḥ|Bavanti|dvE iti|vai|EtE̍ iti|virAjAviti̍# vi-rAjau̱|tayO̱ḥ|Eva|nAnA̱|pratIti|tiṣṭhanti|viṃqśaḥ|vai|puru̍ṣaḥ|daśa̍|hastyA̱ḥ|a~ggula̍yaḥ|daśa̍|padyA̱ḥ|yAvAn̍|Eva|puru̍ṣaḥ|tam|AptvA|uditi̍|tiṣṭhanti|jyOti̍ḥ|gauḥ|Ayu̍ḥ|iti̍|tryahA̍ iti# tri - ahAḥ|Bavanti|iyam|vAva|jyOtiḥ|antari̍kṣam|gauḥ|asau|Ayu̍ḥ|imAn|Eva|lOkAn|aByArO̍hantItya̍Bi̍ - ArOhanti|aBipUrvamitya̍Bi̍ - pUrvam|tryahA iti# tri - ahAḥ|Bavanti|aBipUrvamityaBi̍ - pUrvam|Eva|suvargamiti# suvaḥ - gam|23 (50)
verses.samhita: brahmavarcasinO̱&nnAdA Bavanti̍ dvE vA EtE virAjau tayOrEva̍ nAnA prati# tiṣṭhanti viṃqśO vai puruṣO̍ daśa hastyA# a~ggulayO̍ daśa padyA yAvAnEva̍ puruṣastamAptvOt̍ tiṣṭhanti̍ jyOtirgaurAyuriti# tryahA BavantIyaM̍ ~MvAva jyOtirantari̍kṣaM̍ gaurasAvAyurimAnEva̍ lOkA-naByArOhantyaBipUrvaM̍ tryahA BavantyaBipUrvamEva̍ suvargaM̍ - [ ] 23

verses.padam: - Padam lOkam|aByArOhantItya̍Bi-ArO̍hanti|yat|anyata̍ḥ|pRuṣṭhAni̍|syuḥ|vivi̍vadhamiti̍ vi - vivadham|syAt|maddhyE̱|pRuṣṭhAni|Bavanti|savivadhatvAyEti̍# savivadha - tvAya|Oja̍ḥ|vai|vIrya̱m|pRuṣṭhAni̍|Oja̍ḥ|Eva|vIrya̱m|maddhyataḥ|dadhatE|bRuhadrathantarAByAmiti̍# bRuhat - rathantarAByA̱m|yanti|iyam|vAva|rathantaramiti# rathaM - taram|asau|bRuhat|AByAm|Eva|yanti|athO iti|anayO̱ḥ|Eva|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhanti|EtE̍ iti|vai|yajñasya̍|a~jjasAya̍nI̍ itya~jjasA̍ - ayanI|srutI̍ iti|tAByA̱m|Eva|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|yanti|parA̱~jcaḥ|vai|EtE|suvargamiti# suvaḥ - gam ( )|lOkam|aByArOhantItya̍Bi̍ - ArOhanti|yE|parAcInA̍ni|pRuṣṭhAni̍|upayantItyu̍pa̍ - yanti|pratya~g|tryaha̍ iti# tri - ahaḥ|Bavati|pratyavarUḍhyA̍ iti# prati - avarUḍhyai|athO̍ iti|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|uBayO̱ḥ|lOkayO̱ḥ|RuddhvA|uditi|tiṣṭhanti|atirAtrAvitya̍ti̍ - rAtrau|aBitaḥ|Bavataḥ|brahmavarcasasyEti̍# brahma - varcasasya|annAdyasyEtya̍nna̍ - adyasya|pari̍gRuhItyA̍ iti pari# - gRuhItyai||24 (73) (vRu~jjatE brahma cAM naM̍ ca - suvarga - mEtE suvargaM̍ - trayOviṃśatiśca)̍ (A9)
verses.samhita: ~MlOkamaByArOhanti̍ yadanyataḥ̍ pRuṣṭhAni syurvivivadhaṅ̍ syAnmaddhyE# pRuṣṭhAni# Bavanti savivadhatvAyaujO vai vIryaM̍ pRuṣṭhAnyOja# Eva vIryaM̍ maddhyatO dadhatE̍ bRuhad-rathantarAByA̱M ~MyantIyaM ~MvAva rathantaramasau̍ bRuhadAByAmEva yantyathO# anayOrEva̍ prati# tiṣṭhantyEtE vai yajñasyA̱~jjasAyanI̍ srutI tAByAmEva̍ suvargaM̍ ~MlOkaM ~Myanti̍ parA̱~jcO vA EtE suvargaM̍ ( ) ~MlOkamaByArOhanti̍ yE parAcInA̍ni̍ pRuṣṭhAnyupayanti̍# pratya~g tryahO Bavati̍ pratyavarUḍhyA̍ athO pratiṣṭhityA̍ uBayO̱rlOkayOr.̍ RuddhvOt tiṣṭhantyatirAtrAvaBitO̍# BavatO brahmavarcasa-syAnnAdyasya̍ parigRuhItyai||24̍ (vRu~jjatE brahma cAM naM̍ ca - suvarga - mEtE suvargaM̍ - trayOviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam asau|Adityaḥ|asminn|lOkE|AsIt|tam|dEvAḥ|pRuṣṭhaiḥ|parigRuhyEti# pari - gRuhya|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|agamayann|parai̱ḥ|avastA̱t|parIti|agRuhṇann|divAkIrtyE̍nEti̍# divA - kIrtyEna|suvarga̍ iti# suvaḥ - gE|lOkE|pratIti|asthApayann|parai̱ḥ|parastA̱t|parIti̍|agRuhṇann|pRuṣṭhaiḥ|upAvA̍rOhannityu̍pa̍ - avArOhann|saḥ|vai|asau|Adityaḥ|amuṣminn̍|lOkE|parai̱ḥ|uBayata̍ḥ|pari̍gRuhIta̍ iti pari-gRuhItaḥ|yat|pRuṣṭhAni̍|Bava̍nti|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|Eva|taiḥ|lOkam|yajamAnAḥ|yanti|parai̱ḥ|avastA̱t|parIti̍|gRuhṇanti|divAkIrtyE̍nEti̍# divA - kIrtyEna|25̍ (50)
verses.samhita: asAvAdityO̱&smin̍ ~MlOka AsIt̍ taM dEvAḥ pRuṣṭhaiḥ parigRuhya̍# suvargaM ~MlOkamagamayan̍ parairavastAt̍ paryagRuhṇan̍ divAkIrtyEna̍ suvargE lOkE pratyasthApayan̍ parai̱ḥ parastAt paryagRuhṇan̍ pRuṣṭhairupAvArOhanthsa̍ vA asAvAdityO̍&muṣmi̍n̍ ~MlOkE parairuBayataḥ̍ parigRuhItO̍ yat pRuṣṭhAni Bavanti̍ suvargamEva tairlOkaM ~MyajamAnA̍ yanti parairavastAt̍ pari# gRuhṇanti divAkIrtyEna̍ - [ ] 25

verses.padam: - Padam suvarga iti# suvaḥ-gE|lOkE|pratIti|tiṣṭhanti|parai̱ḥ|parastA̱t|parIti̍|gRuhṇanti|pRuṣṭhaiḥ|upAva̍rOhantItyu̍pa̍ - avarOhanti|yat|parE̱|parastA̱t|na|syuḥ|parA̱~jcaḥ|suvargAditi̍# suvaḥ - gAt|lOkAt|niriti|padyErann|yat|avastA̱t|na|syuḥ|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|niriti|dahEyuḥ|aBita̍ḥ|divAkIrtya̍miti̍# divA - kIrtya̱m|parassAmAna̍ iti paraḥ̍ - sAmAnaḥ|Bavanti|suvarga iti# suvaḥ - gE|Eva|EnAnn|lOkE|uBayataḥ|parIti̍|gRuhṇanti|yaja̍mAnAḥ|vai|divAkI̱rtyamiti̍# divA - kIrtya̱m|saM~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|parassAmAna̍ iti paraḥ̍ - sAmAnaḥ|aBitaḥ|divAkIrtya̍miti̍# divA - kIrtya̱m|parassAmAna̍ iti paraḥ̍ - sAmAnaḥ|Bavanti|saM~Mvathsara iti# saM - vathsarE|Eva|uBayataḥ|26̍ (50)
verses.samhita: suvargE lOkE prati# tiṣṭhanti parai̱ḥ parastAt pari# gRuhṇanti pRuṣṭhairupAvarOhanti̍ yat parE# parastAnna syuḥ parA̱~jcaḥ suvargA-llOkAnniṣpadyEranq.̍ yadavastAnna syuḥ prajA nirdahEyuraBitO̍# divAkIrtyaM̍ parassAmAnO̍ Bavanti suvarga EvainA̱M ~MlOka uBayataḥ̍ pari# gRuhṇanti yajamAnA̍ vai divAkIrtyaṃ̍# saM~Mvathsaraḥ parassAmAnO&BitO̍# divAkIrtyaM̍ parassAmAnO̍ Bavanti saM~Mvathsara EvOBayataḥ - [ ] 26

verses.padam: - Padam pratIti|tiṣṭhanti|pRuṣṭham|vai|divAkIrtya̍miti̍# divA - kIrtya̱m|pArśvE iti|para̍ssAmAna̍ iti paraḥ̍ - sAmAnaḥ|aBitaḥ|divAkIrtya̍miti̍# divA - kIrtya̱m|parassAmAna̍ iti paraḥ-sAmAnaḥ|Bavanti|tasmA̱t|aBita̍ḥ|pRuṣṭham|pArśvE̍ iti|BUyi̍ṣṭhAḥ|grahA̱ḥ|gRuhyantE|BUyi̍ṣṭham|śasyatE|yajñasya̍|Eva|tat|maddhyataḥ|granthim|grathnanti|avi̍sraṃsAyEtyavi̍# - sraṃqsAya|sapta|gRuhyantE|sapta|vai|śIṛqṣaṇyA̱ḥ|prAṇA iti# pra - anAḥ|prAṇAniti# pra - anAn|Eva|yajamAnEṣu|dadhati|yat|parAcInA̍ni|pRuṣṭhAni̍|Bava̍nti|amum|Eva|taiḥ|lOkam|aByArO̍hantItya̍Bi-ArO̍hanti|yat|imam|lOkam|na|27̍ (50)
verses.samhita: prati# tiṣṭhanti pRuṣṭhaM ~Mvai divAkIrtya̍M̍ pArśvE parassAmAnO̍ &BitO# divAkIrtyaM̍ parassAmAnO̍ Bavanti tasmAdaBita̍ḥ̍ pRuṣṭhaM pArśvE BUyiṣṭhA̍ grahA# gRuhyantE BUyiṣṭhaṃ̍ śasyatE yajñasyaiva tanmaddhyatO̍ granthiM grathnantyavi̍sraṃsAya̍ sapta gRuhyantE̍ sapta vai śIṛṣaṇyA̱ḥ̍ prAṇAḥ prAṇAnEva yajamAnEṣu̍ dadhati yat parAcInA̍ni̍ pRuṣṭhAni BavantyamumEva̍ tai-rlOkamaByArOhanti̍ yadimaM ~MlOkaM na - [ ] 27

verses.padam: - Padam pratyavarOhEyuriti̍# prati - avarOhEyuḥ|uditi̍|vA|mAdyE̍yuḥ|yaja̍mAnAḥ|prEti̍|vA|mIyErann|yat|pratIcInA̍ni|pRuṣṭhAni̍|Bava̍nti|imam|Eva|taiḥ|lOkam|pratyava̍rOhantIti̍# prati - avarOhanti|athO̍ iti|asminn|Eva|lOkE|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhanti|anu̍nmAdAyEtyanu̍t̍ - mAdAya|indraḥ|vai|apra̍tiṣṭhita̍ ityaprati̍ - sthitaḥ|AsIt|saḥ|prajApatimiti̍# prajA-patim|upEti|adhAvat|tasmai̱|Etam|EkaviṃqśatirAtramityE̍kaviṃśati̍ - rAtram|prEti|ayacCat|tam|Eti̍|aharat|tEna̍|ayajata|tata̍ḥ|vai|saḥ|pratIti̍|atiṣṭhat|yE|bahuyAjina̍ iti# bahu - yAjinaḥ|apra̍tiṣṭhitA̍ ityaprati̍ - sthitAḥ|28 (50)
verses.samhita: pratyava-rOhE̍yurudvA̍ mAdyEyuryaja̍mAnAḥ̍ pra vA# mIyEranq. yat pratIcInA̍ni̍ pRuṣṭhAni BavantImamEva̍ tairlOkaM pratyavarOhantyathO̍# asminnEva lOkE prati# tiṣṭhantyanunmAdAyEndrO̍ vA apratiṣṭhita̍ AsIth sa prajApati-mupA̍dhAvat̍ tasmA# EtamEkaviṃśatirAtraM̍ prAyacCat̍ tamA&harat̍ tEnAyajata̍ tatO vai sa pratyatiṣṭhadyE̍ bahuyAjinO̍ &pratiṣṭhitAḥ̍ - [ ] 28

verses.padam: - Padam syuḥ|tE|EkaviṃqśatirAtramityEkaviṃśati̍ - rAtram|AsIrann|dvAdaśa|mAsA̱ḥ|pa~jca̍|Rutava̍ḥ|traya̍ḥ|imE|lOkAḥ|asau|Adityaḥ|Ekaviṃqśa̍ ityEka̍ - viṃqśaḥ|EtAvantaḥ|vai|dEvalOkA̍ iti# dEva - lOkAḥ|tEṣu|Eva|yathApUrvamiti̍# yathA - pUrvam|pratIti|tiṣṭhanti|asau|Adityaḥ|na|vIti̍|arOcata|saḥ|prajApa̍timiti̍# prajA - patim|upEti|adhAvat|tasmai̱|Etam|EkaviṃqśatirAtramityE̍kaviṃśati̍ - rAtram|prEti|ayacCat|tam|Eti̍|aharat|tEna̍|ayajata|tata̍ḥ|vai|saḥ|arOcata|yE|Evam|vidvAṃsa̍ḥ|EkaviṃqśatirAtramityE̍kaviṃśati̍ - rAtram|AsatE̍ ( )|rOcantE|Eva|EkaviṃqśatirAtra̍ ityEkaviṃśati̍ - rAtraḥ|Bavati|ruk|vai|Ekaviṃqśa ityEka̍ - viṃqśaḥ|ruca̱m|Eva|gacCanti|athO iti|pratiṣṭhAmiti̍# prati - sthAm|Eva|pratiṣṭhEti# prati - sthA|hi|Ekaviṃqśa ityEka̍ - viṃqśaḥ|atirAtrAvityati̍ - rAtrau|aBitaḥ|Bavataḥ|brahmavarcasasyEti̍# brahma - varcasasya|pari̍gRuhItyA̍ iti pari# - gRuhItyai||29 (71) (gRuhṇanti divAkIrtyEnai̍ - vOBayatO - nA - pratiṣṭhitA̍ - Asata̍ - Ekaviṃśatiśca)̍ (A10)
verses.samhita: syusta Ekaviṃśati-rAtramA̍sIran̍ dvAdaśa̍ mAsAḥ pa~jcartavastraya# imE lOkA asAvAditya̍ Ekaviṃqśa̍ EtAvantO̍ vai dEvalOkAstEṣvEva̍ yathA̍ pUrvaM prati# tiṣṭhantyasAvAdityO̍ na vyarOcata̍ sa prajApatimupA̍dhAvat̍ tasmA# EtamEkaviṃśatirAtraM̍ prAyacCat̍ tamA&harat̍ tEnAyajata̍ tatO vai sO# &rOcata ya EvaM vidvAṃsa# EkaviṃśatirAtramAsatE̍ ( ) rOcanta̍ EvaikaviṃśatirAtrO̍ Bavati̍ rugvA EkaviṃqśO̍ rucamEva̍ gacCantyathO̱̍ pratiṣṭhAmEva pratiṣṭhA̍ hyEkaviṃqśO̍# &tirAtrAvaBitO# BavatO brahmavarcasasya parigRuhItyai||29̍ (gRuhṇanti divAkIrtyEnai̍ - vOBayatO - nA - pratiṣṭhitA̍ - Asata̍ - Ekaviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam arvA~g|yajñaḥ|samiti|krAmatu|amuṣmA̱t|adhIti̍|mAm|aBi||RuṣI̍ṇAm|yaḥ|purOhi̍ta̍ iti# puraḥ - hitaḥ||nirdEvamiti̍ niḥ - dEvam|nirvIramiti̍ niḥ - vIram|kRutvA|viṣkandhamiti̍ vi - skandham|tasminn|hIyatAm|yaḥ|asmAn|dvEṣṭi̍||śarI̍ram|yajñaśamalamiti̍# yajña - śamalam|kusIdam|tasminn̍|sIdatu|yaḥ|asmAn|dvEṣṭi̍||yajña̍|yajñasya̍|yat|tEja̍ḥ|tEna̍|samiti̍|krAma|mAm|aBi||brAhmaṇAn|Rutvija̍ḥ|dEvAn|yajñasya̍|tapa̍sA|tE|sava|aham|Eti̍|huvE||iṣṭEna̍|pakvam|upEti̍|30̍ (50)
verses.samhita: arvA~g yajñaḥ saM krAmatvamuṣmAdadhi̍ mAmaBi|RuṣIṇAM̍ ~Myaḥ purOhitaḥ||nirdE̍vaM̍ nirvIraM̍ kRutvA viṣkandhaM̍ tasmin̍ hIyatAM ~MyO̱&smAn dvEṣṭi|śarI̍raM̍ ~MyajñaśamalaM kusIdaM̍ tasmiṉthsIdatu yO̱&smAn dvEṣṭi||yajña̍# yajñasya yat tEjastEna saMkrAma̍ mAmaBi|brAhmaṇAnRutvijO# dEvAn yajñasya tapasA̍ tE savAhamA huvE||iṣṭEna̍# pakvamupa# - [ ] 30

verses.padam: - Padam tE|huvE|sava|aham||samiti|tE|vRu~jjE|sukRutamiti̍# su - kRutam|samiti|prajAmiti̍# pra - jAm|paśUn||praiṣAniti# pra - EṣAn|sAmidhEnIriti# sAM - idhEnIḥ|AGArAvityA̱ - GArau|AjyaBAgAvityAjya̍# - BAgau|AśrutamityA̍ - śrutam|pratyAśrutamiti̍# prati - Aśrutam|Eti̍|śRuṇAmi|tE||prayAjAnUyAjAniti̍# prayAja - anUyAjAn|sviṣṭakRutamiti# sviṣṭa - kRuta̱m|iḍA̱m|Aśiṣa ityA̱ - śiṣaḥ|Eti̍|vRu~jjE|suva̍ḥ||agninA̱|indrE̍ṇa|sOmE̍na|sara̍svatyA|viṣṇu̍nA|dEvatA̍Biḥ||yAjyAnuvAkyA̱ByAmiti̍# yAjyA - anuvAkyA̱ByAm|upEti|tE|huvE|sava|aham|yajñam|Eti̍|dadE|tE|vaṣa̍ṭkRutamiti̍ vaṣaṭ̍ - kRutam||stutam|śastram|pratigaramiti# prati - garam|graha̱m|iḍA̱m|Aśiṣa ityA̱ - śiṣaḥ|31̍ (50)
verses.samhita: tE huvE savAhaM|saM tE# vRu~jjE sukRutaṃ saM prajAM paśUn||praiṣAnth-sAmidhEnI-rA̍GArAvAjya̍BAgAvA-śru̍taM̍ pratyAśrutamA̍ śRuṇAmi̍ tE|prayAjAnUyAjAnth-sviṣṭakRuta-miḍA̍mAśiṣa̍ A vRu~jjE̍ suvaḥ||agninEndrE̍ṇa̍ sOmEna̍ sarasvatyA̍ viṣṇunA̍ dEvatABiḥ|yAjyAnuvAkyA̱ByAmupa̍# tE huvE savAhaM ~MyajñamA dadE̍ tE vaṣaṭkRutaM||stutaṃ̍ śastraM pratigaraM̍ grahamiḍAmAśiṣa̍ - [ ] 31

verses.padam: - Padam Eti|vRu~jjE|suva̍ḥ||patnIsaM~MyAjAniti̍# patnI-saM~MyAjAn|upEti|tE|huvE|sava|aham|samiṣṭayajuriti̍# samiṣṭa - yajuḥ|Eti|dadE|tava̍||paśUn|sutam|purOḍAśAn̍|sava̍nAni|Eti̍|uta|yajñam||dEvAn|sEndrAniti̍ sa-indrAn|upEti|tE|huvE|sava|aham|agnimu̍KAnityagni̍ - muKAn|sOmavata̍ iti sOma-vataḥ|yE|ca|viśvE̱||32̍ (32) (upa - grahamiḍAmAśiṣO̍ - dvAtriṃśacca)̍ (A11)
verses.samhita: A vRu~jjE̍ suvaḥ|patnIsaM~MyAjAnupa̍# tE huvE savAhaṃ samiṣṭayajurA̍ dadE̍ tava||paśUnth-sutaM̍ purOḍAśAnth-sava̍nAnyOta̍ yajñaM|dEvAnth-sEndrAnupa# tE huvE savAha-magnimuKAnth-sOma̍vatO̍ yE ca viśvE̱||32 (upa - grahamiḍAmAśiṣO̍ - dvAtriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam BUtam|Bavya̱m|Baviṣyat|vaṣaṭ|svAhA̱|nama̍ḥ|Ruk|sAma̍|yaju̍ḥ|vaṣa̍ṭ|svAhA̱|nama̍ḥ|gAyatrI|triṣṭup|jaga̍tI|vaṣa̍ṭ|svAhA̱|nama̍ḥ|pRuthivI|antari̍kṣam|dyauḥ|vaṣa̍ṭ|svAhA̱|nama̍ḥ|agniḥ|vAyuḥ|sUrya̍ḥ|vaṣa̍ṭ|svAhA̱|nama̍ḥ|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|vyAna iti# vi - anaḥ|apAna ityapa-anaḥ|vaṣa̍ṭ|svAhA̱|nama̍ḥ|anna̱m|kRuṣiḥ|vRuṣṭi̍ḥ|vaṣa̍ṭ|svAhA̱|nama̍ḥ|pitA|putraḥ|pautra̍ḥ|vaṣa̍ṭ|svAhA̱|nama̍ḥ|BUḥ|Buva̍ḥ̍ ( )|suvaḥ|vaṣa̍ṭ|svAhA̱|nama̍ḥ||33̍ (54)
verses.samhita: BUtaM BavyaM̍ Baviṣyadvaṣaṭth svAhA nama RuK sAma yajurvaṣaṭth svAhA namO# gAyatrI triṣṭub jagatI̍ vaṣaṭth svAhA namaḥ̍ pRuthivyantari̍kṣaM̍ dyau rvaṣaṭth svAhA namO &gnirvAyuḥ sUryO vaṣaṭth svAhA namaḥ̍ prAṇO-vyAnO-&pAnO̍ vaṣaṭth svAhA namO &nnaM̍ kRuṣi-rvRuṣṭi-rvaṣaṭth svAhA namaḥ̍ pitAputraḥ pautrO vaṣaṭth svAhA namO BUrBuvaḥ ( ) suva rvaṣaṭth svAhA namaḥ||33̍

verses.samhita: vanaspatiByaḥ̍ svAhA mUlE̱Byaḥ svAhA tUlE̱Byaḥ svAhA skandhO̱Byaḥ svAhA śAKA̱Byaḥ svAhA# parṇEByaḥ svAhA puṣpE̱Byaḥ svAhA PalE̱Byaḥ svAhA# gRuhItEByaḥ svAhA &gRuhItEByaḥ̍ svAhA &vapannEByaḥ̍ svAhA śayAnEByaḥ̍ svAhA# śiṣṭAya svAhA &tiśiṣṭAya̍ svAhA pariśiṣṭAya̍ svAhA saṃśiṣṭAya̍ svAhO-cCiṣṭAya̍ svAhA# riktAya svAhA &riktAya̍ svAhA prariktAya̍ svAhA saṃriktAya̍ svAhO -driktAya̍ svAhA sarvasmai̍ svAhA̱||42 (vanaspatiByaḥ̍ - ṣaṭ catvAriṃśat)̍ (A20) praśna kOrvai with starting padams of 1 to 20 anuvAkams :- (prajavaM̍ - brahmavAdinaḥ ki - mEṣa vA Apta - AdityA̍ uBayO̱ḥ - prajApatiranvA̍ya̍ -nnindrO vai sadRu~g - ~gindrO vai śithilaḥ̍ - prajApatirakAmayatA̍ &nnAdaḥ - sA virAḍa - sAvAdityO̱̍ - &rvA~g - BUta - mA mE - &gninA -svAhA&&dhin - dadByO̱& - ~jjyEtAya# - kRuṣṇA - yauṣadhIByO̍ - vanaspatiByO̍ - viṃśatiḥ) kOrvai with starting padams of 1, 11, 21 series of pa~jcAtis :- (prajavaM̍ - prajApati̍ - ryadaCandOmaM̍ - tE# huvE savA&ha - mOṣadhIByO̍ - dvicatvAriṃśat)̍ first and last padam of third praśnam of 7th kAṇḍam (prajavaṃq - sarvasmai̍ svAhA̱)||hariḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM saptamakAṇḍE tRutIyaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||================================= OM namaḥ paramAtmanE, śrI mahAgaṇapatayE namaḥ, śrI guruByO namaḥ hariḥ OM 7.4 saptamakAṇḍE caturthaḥ praśnaḥ - satrakarmanirUpaṇaM
